articles.description: Fans of Escape From Tarkov are waiting for a Halloween event that doesn't seem to be surfacing, but Nikita Buyanov has shared an update...
articles.content: If there’s one thing that Escape From Tarkov’s player base lives for, it’s the many events that the developer, Battlestate Games, pushes live throughout the year. From the festive-themed, gift-bearin… [+1405 chars]
